page.title: 18LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: We are lucky because we have many ways in which we can spend our leisure time. A lot of it is spent on the beach and on the seafront. There are two piers in our area, Shanklin and Sandown. On each there is a theatre where people go to watch the shows and have a drink. There are shops on the piers which sell sweets and souvenirs. The arcades and the slot machines there are very popular. Many people in ln our area paricipate in fishing activities of some kind. Further inland we have two Leisure centres. Sandown Leisure centre has two swimming pools ,squash courts, cafeteria, sunbeds, and a sauna.At South Wight Sports Centre you can play badminton, cricket,tennis, gymnastics and many more activities. We have youth clubs and a cinema.
